name: Kundans Bridal Couture

description: Bridal Couture is a designer couture label based in Delhi that creates innovative fashion with a perfect balance of contemporary designs and Indian craftsmanship. Every piece of clothing has a unique feature that makes the bride and bridesmaid feel and look their best on their special days. Bridal Couture is a dependable and talented designer who ensures customer satisfaction by using high-quality fabrics and keeping the bride-to-vision be's and requirements in mind. They have showcased their responsible work and have gained the trust of their clients. They have an experience of over 5 years in the industry now which accounts for a very long time. Bridal Couture store typeThey have both a retail shop and boutique both of which are jam-packed with a lot of clients. Because they treat all their clients with a lot of patience and respect. The client can get in their ideas and thoughts about their dresses tell them and they can customize a design for them. These are known as customized outfits, a service that Bridal Couture offers. Another important service that a store or retail shop must offer is ready-to-purchase outfits or they are more commonly called the outfits from racks. Here, the client can directly come in and choose the outfit which they like from the shop. These are readymade clothes.   They offer both these services to serve the interest of various clients because different brides want different kinds of bridal clothes.

review: Vedika Mishra

It was an amazing experience working with Amaltas Couture. I bought my wedding lehenga from here. The fitting was stunning, even though my measurements were taken on a video call! Everyone complimented me on the lehenga on my wedding.
And best is that their prices are reasonable! Thanks team.
Rekha Ratudi

When I was looking for an outfit to wear at my sister's wedding, it was my sister who suggested we buy from Amaltas Couture. As soon as my mother set her eyes on their pieces we were sold. I ordered a custom new lehenga in a beautiful powder pink.
 
If having a covid wedding wasn't a challenge enough, we were having to purchase our wedding day outfits online from vendors we had never met before. So when we had a video call with Shruti we knew that Amaltas was the place where I would buy my outfit from.
Shruti has a unique quality of pre-empting what you like, what suits you and what fits your occasion. It was her keen attention to detail that led us to placing an order for a lehenga I had always imagined I would wear for my sister's wedding.
With crossed fingers we placed the order, after which Shruti very sweetly got on a video call with us to make sure I am sending over the right measurements. Their patience and understanding left me greatly assured of the final product.
When the outfit arrived (well within their promised timeline) I was very happy. Whether it was the perfect fit or their attention to detail everything was beyond my expectations. The outward intricate work on the beautiful lehenga was so well complemented by the comfort and gentleness of the outfit from within.
On the day of the wedding the outfit felt as light as a feather. I was on my feet all day but never once did I think 'I should have picked an easier outfit'. Amaltas Couture is a unique blend of style and comfort, of standing apart yet blending in, of looking gorgeous yet staying true to yourself.
For me there was never a moment when I had a second thought about the quality, the delivery or the fit of the garment. I was very excited to be wearing their creation. Can't wait for the pictures! Sending you lots of love!
Maitri Saxena

Shruti walked me through her store via video call. I was nervous ordering something without actually seeing or feeling the fabric. Also wasn’t sure about wiring a deposit to a place I had no idea was legit. But I could see even from the video call that the people, store and pieces were not only legit but QUALITY.  She instantly understood the aesthetic I was going for (soft, romantic, flowy, whimsical). They custom created my Lengha from scratch and even assisted with adding some short sleeves and an additional dupatta (which I didn’t actually wind up needing as I chose not to wear a dupatta over my head). From start to finish (product in hand in US), took about 6 weeks. That was definitely a rush and I’m thankful they were on top of it every step of the way. Very professional, friendly and accommodating. Wonderful experience —- I’ve already recommended them to many others.
I absolutely loved my wedding dress! Many thanks to Shruti and the Amaltas team!
Ramika Nerula

They were very helpful in offering options in my size. Rather than pushing to buy they gave candid feedback on what was looking good and what wasn’t. Very enjoyable experience and picked up some great outfits.
Lata Sabarwaal

My incredibly stunning out arrived last week! I am over the moon. It is just beautiful. I could not have asked for more.
Their support was also just amazingly thorough, and thoughtful.
I am so pleased with all of those who helped me, and continued to offer their support.
I cannot recommend Amaltas Couture highly enough!
Thank all of you support and designers so very much.
Samvedhna Iyer

I received my Lehanga and very happy to report that it looks exactly like in the pic. on website and instagram. I was worried about the color and fabric. But no more worries. Their skilled photographers have an eye for detail, capturing all the laughter, tears, and priceless moments that make your wedding day truly unique.Documentary Film: Classy Click Photography goes beyond traditional wedding videography by creating a cinematic documentary film that tells the story of your wedding day. Their licensed drone pilots will capture breathtaking aerial shots, adding a unique and captivating perspective to your wedding memories.Food Photography: Classy Click Photography's expertise extends beyond weddings. review: Nitesh Tiwari

From the haldi ceremony to the wedding and all the way through to the reception, our photographer captured every single moment with such authenticity and beauty. Each photo feels like a work of art, telling the story of each part of the celebration in ways we could have only dreamed of.

**Haldi**: They managed to perfectly capture the joy, the playfulness, and the raw emotion of the haldi ceremony. Every smile, splash, and laughter-filled moment is frozen in time for us to cherish. The vibrant yellows and the candid expressions all bring back that joy each time we look through the photos!

**Engagement**: The engagement session was simply magical! Our photographer knew exactly how to make us feel comfortable, guiding us with gentle cues for those natural shots while also capturing our little candid moments in between. The results were stunning, capturing not just the beauty of the event, but also our personalities and chemistry.

**Wedding**: This was where their artistry really shone through. Every ritual, every tear, every smile, and every emotion was captured in such a way that each photo feels like a moment you can step back into. From the intricate details of the decor to the intimate expressions between us and our families, the pictures speak volumes. They truly told our love story through the lens.

**Reception**: The reception photos are filled with energy and life! Our photographer caught the vibrant atmosphere of the celebration and our guests’ joy so naturally. Every dance move, every laugh, every heartfelt speech—it’s all there. The images are timeless yet full of life, and they somehow managed to make even the crowded dance floor look like a scene out of a fairytale.

Overall, our photographer went above and beyond in every way imaginable. Not only are they talented, but they also made us feel at ease, which is so crucial for natural-looking photos. We now have an incredible collection of memories, beautifully captured, that we’ll treasure for a lifetime. If you’re looking for someone who will truly immortalize your special day, look no further. Highly, highly recommended!
Sushant Kashyap

name: Wedifys
description: Wedifys is a premier luxury wedding planning company specializing in heritage venues and destination weddings. Founded in 2012 and based in Jaipur, Rajasthan, Wedifys blends timeless traditions with modern sophistication to craft bespoke celebrations. Renowned for planning weddings in iconic locations like royal palaces, serene beaches, and exotic destinations, they deliver seamless, stress-free experiences. From meticulous planning to stunning décor, Wedifys ensures every wedding is a flawless masterpiece, reflecting elegance, grandeur, and your unique love story.Services providedAt Wedifys, they offer end-to-end wedding planning and execution services tailored to your unique needs and vision. Their services include:Full Wedding Planning: Comprehensive management of every detail, from conceptualization to execution.Destination Wedding Expertise: Specialized planning for weddings at exotic locations and heritage venues.In-House Décor Services: Bespoke décor crafted by their expert team to match your style and theme.Venue Selection & Management: Assistance in selecting and managing top-tier venues worldwide.Entertainment Management: Curating world-class artists, live performances, and unique experiences for your guests.Hospitality & Guest Management: Seamless coordination of guest logistics, accommodations, and personalized hospitality.Vendor Coordination: Managing top-tier vendors, ensuring quality and precision.Customized Wedding Themes: Designing and executing unique themes to make your wedding truly unforgettable.From royal palaces in Rajasthan to serene beaches in Goa and international destinations, Wedifys brings your dream wedding to life with unmatched precision and creativity.USPWedifys is the Masters of Luxury & Heritage Weddings. Wedifys stands out as a pioneer in luxury destination weddings, renowned for crafting extraordinary celebrations at heritage venues and iconic locations worldwide. Whether it’s a royal palace in Rajasthan, a serene beach in the Maldives, or an exotic retreat in Bali, they combine meticulous planning, bespoke décor, and seamless execution to deliver weddings that exude elegance and exclusivity. With Wedifys, every detail is a step towards creating an unforgettable experience. Your perfect wedding, reimagined.Key cities in which Wedifys has planned weddingsGoaUdaipurJaipurKeralaJodhpurShimlaAndaman and Nicobar IslandsRishikeshAgraMussoorieRajasthanHyderabadJaisalmerBangalorePushkarKovalamMumbaiAmritsarKolkataVaranasiNainitalJim Corbett^

How often does it happen that a service provider becomes an integral part of your family through a 'Kismat Connection'? 

It happened to us! 

It was the spring of 2022, nine months before our long-planned wedding.
After booking our dream destination wedding venue, The Umaid Lake Palace in Dausa, I shortlisted three of the best wedding planners suited for that venue. Krishnchandra Events was among them. I contacted all three, discussed our vision for the wedding in great detail, and requested detailed quotes. Krishnchandra Events quickly became our top choice, and we were on the verge of finalizing them.
However, unfortunately, we ended up choosing our second favorite planner (after paying a deposit) because they were based in our city, which we thought would make communication easier as the wedding approached. (Out of respect for privacy, I will not disclose the name, but it will become apparent later). 

Fast forward to October, two months before our wedding, everything was going according to plan. We were relaxed and simply basking in the excitement of our upcoming dream event. Suddenly, our chosen planner caused a complete breakdown in communication and disappeared.
To make a long story short, we were forced to make the difficult decision to change planners at the last minute, 2 months before our wedding.
Then, Krishnchandra Events emerged as our savior. Despite our initial hesitation, they literally saved us, stepping in when it was almost too late.
Can you imagine a planner who had been booked showing no interest in meeting with their clients, while another, whom we had not initially chosen and who wasn't even based in our city, was kind enough to meet with us on just 12 hours' notice? 

That's why we call it a Kismat Connection with Krishnchandra Events! They were destined to plan and curate our wedding. 

Now I'll explain in details that how they become a part of our family: 

Basically the admin of KrishnaChandra Events are a Band Baja Barat ditto sweet couple 'Shivani and Ankit' who give their all to make your wedding more special. 

Shivani is more of a service provider and less of a businesswoman. She has the capacity to incur a loss to give you better service.
From decor to all services, she and her team took care of every detail, swift and beautifully. 

We were absolutely delighted with the exceptional service provided by the KC team for our wedding!
From the very first meeting, it was clear that they were dedicated to bringing our dream wedding to life, offering personalized attention and demonstrating unparalleled professionalism every step of the way.
Throughout the wedding, we never faced a single issue. 

The imagination of our wedding that we had in our minds was understood well by her, that she created the same in reality with each and every detail, making it even more beautiful than we imagined.
Their ability to understand our vision and preferences was truly remarkable, and they went above and beyond to ensure that every detail was perfect. The planning process was seamless, thanks to their exceptional organizational skills, creativity, and vast network of high-quality vendors.
Apart from our requirements, she helped us with so many small details that we forgot to mention to them at first place. 

During all 3 days including all functions, everything flowed smoothly, allowing us to truly enjoy every moment without any stress. The decor was breathtaking, the timeline was executed flawlessly, and every element came together better than we could have ever imagined.
There were a lot of small things where shivani really shown her reliable side. 

Our relatives and guests still praise their work and efforts. Our whole family to this day feels so grateful towards them.
Really Shivani and Ankit are so adorable that you'll forget they are planners because they will become a cousin or friend who is curating your wedding. 

we loved them so much that we immediately finalized them for my brother's wedding (even though he hasn't finalized the bride... haha). 

As closing lines: Giving our dream wedding into the hands of Shivani & Ankit was the best decision! Touch wood.
Passion for their work shines through in the happiness of their clients. We are beyond grateful for their dedication and hard work, which made our special day unforgettable.
I highly recommend Shivani & Ankit known as 'KrishnaChandra Events' to any couple looking for a wedding planner who will go the extra mile to ensure their wedding day is nothing short of magical. 

They are Magical!

Shukriya with Regards,
KIVISHA
Dr. Kiran Singh & Dr. Vishal Singh

❤🧿
Aayush Rinwa

name: Sulakshana Monga
address: Soltee by Sulakshana Monga, New Delhi, Delhi, India
description: Sulakshana Monga’s designs are works of art. Her cuts are immaculate and her fit is impeccable. Her clothes convey class and luxury. Her clothes bridge the gap between the contemporary and the traditional. Her label aims to combine the Western mindset with Indian ethos to create something that appeals to the modern generation. All her clothes, be it Indian wear or Western, pay homage to her heritage. Sulakshana Monga has been awarded the prestigious Bharat Gaurav Award in 2014 and the Shyama Prasad Mukherjee Award in 2015.If you are looking for an outfit that exemplifies class through the use of rich fabrics, intricate embroidery and beautiful handiwork, then a Sulakshana Monga outfit is what you should choose. Either as your bridal outfit or as a part of your trousseau, it will ensure that all eyes are on you and you get a lot of compliments. If you need an outfit for any occasion such as a cocktail or a mehendi, Sulakshana Monga Label will be able to fulfil your requirements.Outfit TypesThe Sulakshana Monga Label can cater to people of varied tastes and choices because they have a wide variety of outfits in terms of styles and designs. Some of the various types of outfits that they can customize for their clients are:Bridal lehengasAnarkalisSarisGownsIndo-Western OutfitsMenswear and much moreHow much does a Sulakshana Monga outfit cost?The price of any outfit is determined by its design, cut, fabric, embroidery and embellishment. Outfits by Sulakshana Monga are known for their elegant styling, sharp cuts and contemporary silhouettes. The starting range of her gorgeous outfits is INR 25,000 (approx.) and they can go up to INR 5,00,000 (approx.)Working StyleSulakshna Monga designs are the epitome of traditional Indian wear with the fusion of contemporary Western designs. She is the popular choice for the men and women of this generation who want outfits that are comfortable and modern and yet reflect their traditions and are classy. With easily accessible stores in New Delhi, Mumbai, Ludhiana, and even in Birmingham, UK, it is easy for customers to visit and make their choice from ready to purchase outfits or place orders on sample pieces available at the studio. One can even take an appointment with Sulakshana Monga and have an outfit designed exclusively for you.

name: Pale Pink Studio
description: Pale Pink Studio is a design studio based out of New Delhi, owned by Suruchi Gulati. She is a watercolour and digital artist, illustrator, and designer. She is inspired by the natural world around her and everything from the changing colours of the season, to the intricacy of a flower, inspire her. She lives between India, Ireland and the Netherlands but works on projects worldwide. She is passionate about creating lasting and beloved pieces of artwork and illustrations. Every invite that she designs has hand-painted illustrations using watercolours or mixed digital media.From the artist of Pale Pink Studio- Suruchi Gulati“I always used to notice how such beautiful and extravagant wedding invitations just became trash after the wedding was over. I wanted to think of something that didn’t create so much waste and also a way to gift a keepsake to the guest along with the invitation. Because I am an artist before I am an invite designer, I thought why not design the invitations in a way that the guest receives an art print that they can later get framed and hang on their walls, or if the budget allows, give them a framed artwork along with a small page of the invite. This kind of invite is sustainable and also reusable by the guest, and a wonderful keepsake of the beautiful memories a wedding holds. All the invites I design have a sense of sustainability. They will make your guests happy and give them artwork for their homes along with a wedding invitation! I try to be organic and illustrate with an aesthetic of subtle grace. Many of my pieces feature mixed textures from materials like handmade recycled cotton paper, vellum, and recycled fabric.”Working Style of Pale Pink StudioPale Pink Studio is passionate about working closely with their clients to create wedding stationery as closely as possible. The artist listens carefully to each idea and works to combine all your ideas into a creation that is personal and beautiful. They hand illustrate each element of your invite, using watercolours or digitally, then design everything digitally using the hand-painted elements. Pale Pink Studio can make digital E-invites or hard copies of the same using artisan environment-friendly papers. By using a variety of printing techniques, including gold foiling and embossing.Products/Services OfferedHandmade InvitationsDigital E-invitesAll wedding collaterals including itineraries, welcome boards, signages etcCustom Logo or Monogram designShort videos or GIFs

यदि आप एक गुणवत्तापूर्ण कैटरिंग सेवा ढूंढ रहे हैं, तो पार्टीवालाज एक भरोसेमंद और प्रभावशाली विकल्प है। वे हर आयोजन को खास बनाने की काबिलियत रखते हैं।

review: Adam Eckersley

I bought from the Delhi airport store and the sales team quoted me a price of circa £35-40 for an item of jewellery which I confirmed several times before purchasing. They then charged my card to the value of £330 by putting a different amount into the card machine than they did on the calculator when I discussed the cost (Rs3508 on the calculator and then Rs35080 on the system). My colleague also fell victim to this to the amount of almost £900 instead of the circa £80 that she was quoted.

They take a huge amount of time which means you are getting closer and closer to your flight time and they place your invoice and receipt into the envelope so you do not see this straight away. All the time talking amongst themselves or to you to distract.

When contacted they claimed it could never be the price quoted as it is gold - they do not inform you of the materials they only talk price. They then refuse to engage in any communication after this and essentially get away with fraud. DO NOT buy from this company, you will only come to regret it.

review: Srijani Balaji

Getting Turiya to plan your wedding is the absolute best decision you could ever make! 

We hired the services of Turiya Celebrations for my sister's wedding and they were spectacular. Madhumita and Balaji are the kindest and most hardworking and dedicated team of wedding planners I've ever had the pleasure of knowing.

These are some of the reasons why you should hire Turiya for your wedding.

1. They are extremely dedicated and client friendly. 
Which means that they will execute your vision exactly how you want it.

2. They are very easy to work it. 
Planning a wedding is hectic and your team must be open and willing to support you through it all, which Turiya does perfectly.

3. They understand your needs and requirements perfectly. 
They make executing your dream wedding within your specificied budget their goal and they never fall short on achieving their goals.

4. Turiya becomes part of your wedding and family.
They don't just treat you like clients but as friends and family. So your wedding is also their wedding and they'll make sure it's perfect.

Overall,I highly recommend Turiya to everyone. They are simply the best!
varsha p k

Thanks to Balaji,Madhu and their team for organising the decor for our wedding and reception. They did commendable job with the limited time and budget we had in hand. They were considerate of our ideas/requirements while being realistic about our limitations. I personally like their mood board idea that provides a visual perspective of all our ideas. They provided alot of options and alternatives to choose from - right from mandapam decor to umbrella colors. They were quick to respond, patient with making alterations and maintained a friendly and professional demeanor throughout the planning and wedding events. I would happily recommend their team for planning events :)
vinodhini chandra sekaran

Thanks Turiya for making us feel more special on our big day.. thanks for creating awesome wedding memories... 
From the start till the end you guys planned everything with perfection... 
Special thanks to madhu ma'am, Balaji sir and karunakaran sir for great coordination.. 
Thanks to the team turiya..
C. S. SANTHI
Liked the theme, decoration, arrangements, and food which created a long lasting memory for us.
Mrs. Sumathy Balaji

Had a very good experience with Turiya celebrations. They were like family and showed a lot of interest, enthusiasm, professionalism and took care of all details. I would strongly recommend them to all my friends and family. Best wishes to Madhumitha, Balaji and the entire team of Turiya.
Preeta

A truly unique and beautiful wedding experience created by team Turiya! Not only was every detail looked into, they envisioned the decor, service, design and catering to the T. All this with value for money in mind. We highly recommend Turiya for your big day!
Sreepriya

turiya had done an excellent job for my son's wedding. lighting and props were too good. Madhu and Balaji  knew what we wanted and were very cooperative and adaptable to all our requirements. Thanks turiya team.
Mohit Dandekar

Excellent job done by Turia. Both Balaji and Madhu went above and beyond for our wedding, and it wouldn't have been so special without their hard work. I would recommend them to anyone who wants an extremely professional and dedicated team for their special day.
krishnan pr

Great job by Turiya ! Truly a celebration!
Excellent co ordination by Mr Balaji, Madhu and team.
I will definitely recommend Turiya celebrations to anyone who wants A to Z wedding related services.

"Turiya" Madhu & Bala are the kindest and sweetest - and everything a bespoke wedding planner should be. Their eyes for detail gives the ability to turn into much more than just a planner. It's like hiring a designer and planner all in one. I loved how personal it felt to work with them. it felt like I was planning the wedding with my family... in a good way! Above all, wedding planning can be stressful at times, but their kindness makes the journey actually enjoyable.

name: Tanushree Bhasin Photography
description: Tanushree Bhasin Photography are excellent wedding photographers. They believe in making your “THE” day memorable. They want to make you feel like a celebrity for the same reason. They are a group of professional photographers who know how to capture all of the emotions expressed that day in a single frame, specializing in Photographic Cinematic Wedding Stories. Pre-Wedding Shoots & Candid Wedding Photography! We are a group of photojournalists who enjoy telling stories through our lenses! India Wedding Photographer for destination weddings. Their team of experts does arrangements for their client’s specific desires and visions, helping to ensure that their wedding is everything they hoped for. They work with various price points without compromising service quality to serve a diverse core audience. They have been doing this work for a very long time and hence have a lot of experience. Services offered by Tanushree Bhasin PhotographyClients generally look for a plethora of variety in the services offered by the makeup artist because this makes them seem diverse and an expert. Some of which are mentioned below. They are excited to travel throughout India. They are both genuine, just like the standard pro. They offer services like:Candid PhotographyWedding Films Pre Wedding Shoots Pre Wedding Films Maternity Shoots Fashion Shoots these are photographers by trade as well as by passion; they are entertainers who will bring to life events that are happening now as well as in the future. All this variety in their services is the main attraction for the clients. Absolutely everything is taken care of them. They commit to taking care of the bride and groom’s most important day.Tanushree Bhasin Photography’s working styleThey have a delivery time of about a month which is roughly some days. Also, the most booked package of their till date is a good figure. They take care of the minutest detail and have an eye for perfection. This eye for detail that they have enables them to capture the hearts of all their clients with their work.
review: Prerna Parashar

Tanushree and her team covered all our wedding functions. They took the most candid interviews and edited them into a beautiful movie/ trailer. They understood who our main people were and made sure to capture them perfectly.
Abhirup Dam

I booked Tanushree and her team for my cousin's three-day wedding. She is not only a talented photographer but also great at bringing out the best in people. She has a dedicated and hard working team who ensure that you are treated with extra care and attention. Highly recommended
Arushi Singh

Tanushree’s team was wonderful to work with! 

We had a very big reception event and Tanushree’s team handled it with great efficiency. They captured so many beautiful candid moments, as well as politely corralled guests for group photos, all while keeping constant documentation of us (the bride and groom). They made sure to learn who was who in both sides of our family so that they could give enough coverage to our parents and close relatives as well. They made sure to handle all planning and info gathering well in advance of our events so that they could operate independently, allowing us to focus fully on the wedding. 

Their filming of the wedding and mehendi ceremonies was beautifully cinematic, and captured not only the bride and groom, but also the guests reactions, excitement, and happiness. 

The team was flexible with the unexpected but often unavoidable last minute changes that happen in weddings, and were always courteous, professional, and warm.

We and our families have framed so many photographs from the event captured by Tanushree Bhasin Photography. They really did a beautiful job!
Pratima Chabbi

Tanushree is an outstanding wedding photographer. Our interactions before the wedding were easy. She was attentive to our ideas and preferences and understood our style and desires. What truly sets her apart is her professionalism and ability to blend seamlessly into the event. Throughout the day, her unobtrusive presence ensured that the entire experience felt natural and relaxed for my cousin and her partner. We never felt like we were posing for the camera; we could be ourselves, and the photos reflect that authenticity.

Every photograph captured the essence and emotion of the moment, preserving memories that will last our family a lifetime. Her ability to capture candid shots was remarkable, and we hardly noticed her presence, yet she managed to encapsulate the most heartfelt and genuine moments of the day. Thanks for gifting us with photographs that we will cherish forever.
Aparajita Bhasin

Tanushree and her team were super fun and easy to work with, and the photographs and videos came out really beautifully. The team was very receptive and were always ahead of what needed to be done. Their personalise approach and Tanushree's involvement really made a huge difference. Thanks CWB for covering my cousin's wedding !
ashish

Extremely professional and cooperative.. gave us confidence at every step.. delivered everything professionally and on time and high quality work.. 
They really understand that wedding functions can be stressful and they are super in tune with what the groom/bride family wants.. amazing value for cost, very grateful to have had them cover our reception!
Rajat Narang

It's been 2 years since our wedding but it feels like yesterday only, all thanks to the memories created by Camera waale Baraati!! As soon as we saw their work we knew they were the right fit for what we wanted on our wedding. Right from the planning to execution and delivery Tanushree was personally involved with each and every aspect of the work and due this personal touch they truly understand the type of clients they are working with and their tastes and work with you accordingly. We don't like to pose much and they were made fully aware of the same and were fully sensitive towards that. We specifically wanted more of candid work and they truly delivered with 5 star quality. Also, they were very punctual, we never had to call Tanushree to be on time, in fact it was the opposite, they reached before time on every venue and called us everytime as we were running late!

Their technique is truly different from everyone else and their attention to detail is mind blowing. The cherry on top is the cinematography. Again, due the personal touch involved they know you as a client and what you want in terms of songs in the videos too and they didn't disappoint at all. The songs completely compliment the earthy wedding we had.

All in all I would say you get what you pay for. The quality is there for all to see and I would happily recommend them to anyone who wants to have a genuine work done for their wedding!

Kudos to the whole team...
Noopur Abhishek

Tanushree and team are incredibly talented. They shot three intimate events for my wedding and clicked natural and authentic photos, and recorded a fun, memorable video. Would recommend them for small or big occasions, a pleasant and competent team, who deliver high quality outputs at affordable prices!
VibhintaVerma

They were and are still lovely. I shortlisted CWB from the options on the WMG app and my brother coordinated booking them over the phone. Tanushree and her team were the perfect choice for us. Their team worked all day (from the haldi till the pheras) without any fuss. They were so unobtrusive and cooperative. Ours was a small wedding in the midst of the lockdown (only 50 people) and the best part was that these guys blended so seamlessly into the crowd and did their job without causing any inconvenience to anyone. The images and the videos are lovely. They are authentic moments, without excessive touch ups and editing. There are some beautiful images captured by them. Am so happy to have chosen them
Sahil Sambhi

CWB were such thorough professionals  with a very personalised approach. That's what you want when you hire someone to capture your best moments. Loved having them to cover us. All the best to the entire team.

5 stars aren’t enough to tell you how happy we are that we booked you and your team for our wedding. Probably the best decision ever! 

Nikunj and I are do not like posing and getting too many pictures clicked. But trust me, you guys made us want to do all of it!

Lots of luck for all the future adventures 

Cheers! 
Chhavi & Nikunj

Truly one of the best photography I've ever come across. You've captured the best moments for us, and your creativity is totally a dazzler to the eyes. I'm so so glad for choosing you for my sister's engagement photography, can't thank you enough, Ronak! :)
Vinita Saboo

One of the best choice we made for our Big Day. Most humble , friendly, sweet and highly professional photographer. 
Thank you for giving us the best of memories. Pre-wedding till wedding shoot was super fun experience with the entire team.
You guys are doing a great job. Keep rocking! Good Luck:)

In the process of shortlisting a photography team for our wedding, we came across FRAMED. We liked their work and wanted to have a meeting to see if things could go forward. We saw some more of their photography and videography skills and freezed on them (so glad today that we did it). Wedding took place at Ibiza, outskirts of Kolkata and the entire event was shot by their very enthusiastic and equally skilled team. A wedding is a once in a lifetime event and FRAMED nailed it completely for us. From amazing captures to amazing angles to amazing monochromes to awesome videos, they made it all worth the wait. They very patiently handled and took care of our requirements and at the end of a day, did a FAB work. Totally recommend the team at FRAMED if you are looking at once in a lifetime capturing of beautiful memories to cherish all your life!!! Take a bow, team FRAMED!!!

P.S. This Ronak guy is really good at making you comfortable and is a great friend to have at the end of the day. So along with a fab job, you also get a fab dost (woh bhi free free free, despite him being a gujju mind it)...

A great team of photographers. A must book for all people who getting married and looking to get their moments captured in the best possible manner. :)

Play The Novel didn't just capture our wedding, they captured the depth of every emotion in the most beautiful and meaningful way possible. Their creative vision, attention to detail, and ability to convey raw emotions are simply extraordinary. If you’re looking for a team that’s not only exceptionally talented but also genuinely passionate about telling your unique story, PTN is everything you could wish for and more.
Tasneem G. S.

Words can hardly express how we felt about the work PlaytheNovel’s team did capturing our wedding and story. From the moment we met Raveena and Khozema, we knew they understood not just the aesthetic of our love story but the heart of it. They didn’t just take pictures, they told a beautiful narrative of us and our journey. The whole team, from our prewedding to the wedding, was patient and attentive with us and cheered us both whenever we needed to pose or then had a special moment that they were going to capture. The team captured us and our story in the most genuine light. We truly felt that Raveena and Khozy honored our love, not only in how the wedding captured it visually but also in how respected and celebrated the unique elements of our relationship. Thank you for being such a big part of our day. The images and wedding videos, as promised, are being seen regularly, which reflects what a great job the team has done!

name: Movie'ing Moments
description: Movie'ing Moments is a team of young photographers and filmmakers who are passionately inclined towards storytelling in the most visually stunning way. The founder, Vaaibhav Singvi, and his passion for filmmaking, love for weddings, and joy in creating stories by freezing moments led to the establishment of this venture. This group of wedding photographers at Movie’ing Moments aim to capture the beautiful ceremonies, rituals and the culture in all its essence and rich, vibrant glory. Their insatiable desire in making marriages the most wonderful event ensure supremacy in their work across every aspect. After all, the clients are the celebrities in the movie of their life, and the directors at Movie’ing Moments do a damn good job at putting the story together!Movie’ing Moments is based out of Mumbai but they cover weddings all over. Several years of experience, the very best and latest technology, and an undying love for their craft is what makes them one of the best wedding photographers around. If visually stunning captures are what you are looking for, then look no further.From The Photography Team:“We at Movie’ing Moments, capture the essence of a wedding by redacting the moments through films and stills. We believe that every wedding has a story behind it and we record and release it. We present the story in the visually most beautiful way. With a belief that marriage is a sacred union of two loving souls and hence, we make sure to keep the essence of the ceremonies alive. Our films and stills reel out moments where the bride donning her pretty lehenga takes pheras with the dapper groom, where the cupid showers it’s love and jubilates the triumph of love, where the bridesmaids demand a handsome sum of money from their brother- in- law, where the in- laws gel up like old friends, where the friends of the bride and groom try desperately to document their own love story amidst the hullabaloo of the wedding. We love weddings and make you fall in love every time you unfold the wedding memories captured by Movie’ing Moments.”Services Offered by Movie’ing MomentsAn extensive range of services related to photography and videography are offered, such as:Wedding PhotographyCandid PhotographyTraditional PhotographyPre-Wedding ShootWedding Videos ...and so much more!Does Movie’ing Moments travel outstation for destination weddingsTheir team is happy to travel for destination and outstation weddings, too. Please note that in such cases, the costs involved with respect to travel and accommodation for the team are to be borne by the client. Latest Pricing and Portfolio of Movie’ing MomentsFor further details and queries regarding bookings and packages, kindly contact the team directly. On the WedMeGood portal, you will find the necessary contact information. Here, you will also find Movie’ing Moment’s impressive portfolio, photo albums, prices and their customer reviews.

name: Dipak Studios
description: Dipak Studios, powered by imaging experts Mohan & Raman Dipak, is a renowned wedding photography company based in Lajpat Nagar 2, South Delhi. Loved by celebrities like Rishi Kapoor and Amitabh Bachchan, Dipak Studios aims to deliver moments with a unique flavor, making them feel timeless. Established in 1962 by Mr. Sunder Dipak as a small photo studio in Faridabad, it is now led by his sons Raman and Mohan, who have successfully covered hundreds of celebrity weddings all over India.Services Offered by Dipak StudiosThe team specializes in photojournalistic, modern, and imaginative styles of photography. They specialize in both candid and traditional styles of photography and videography, ensuring that every moment of your pre-wedding, wedding, and post-wedding functions is beautifully captured. They provide high-quality photographs and videos within one to two months after the functions, offering a variety of packages that can be customized according to your budget. The services offered by the team include:Candid PhotographyTraditional PhotographyPre-wedding ShootsCinematographyTraditional VideographyAlbumsPhotoboothWorking Style of Dipak StudiosThe team is dedicated to delivering candid and narrative moments that weave a story around your special day. They strive to capture every detail with perfection and finesse, ensuring that each photograph tells a story and evokes emotions.Travels to Venue:The team operates from three locations with a head office in Delhi and wedding studios in Faridabad and Gurgaon. They are open to traveling to various locations to cover wedding functions, providing photography services at reasonable prices for destination weddings.

name: Rambagh Palace - Jaipur
description: Located in Jaipur, Rambagh Palace hosts many signature experiences which makes it perfect for a wedding or any gathering. Originally built in 1835, the palace has rich textured rooms and opulent furnishings, which makes it perfect for wedding guests to retire. The gardens are arranged in brilliant symmetry. On arrival, guests are welcomed by decorated camels and Rajasthan ladies which perform tikka ceremonies. Space availableWhen it comes to wedding celebrations, they has a Hall which is ideal for cocktail parties and pre-wedding ceremonies and a lawn for hosting wedding ceremony. It is a beautiful venue that adds grandeur to all your events.Hall The indoor banquet hall has the capacity to host 500 people at the same time and is just the perfect venue to host pre wedding ceremonies such as mehendi, haldi ceremony or an engagement party.Lawn The lush and green outdoor lawn is a great option to host grand wedding ceremony or a reception party that has a guest list of about 1000 people.Rooms There are 45 rooms and 33 suites with stunning views Facilities Available in Rambagh PalaceAs per the decor policy, the decorators for any event must be selected from the enlisted panel. Be it a simple and classy décor or an extravagant one, their in-house décor teams can do it all with utmost perfection. They do not allow any other decor vendor from other than those mentioned in their panel.CuisinesThey have in house catering policy. With an extensive catering option, they have a multi-cuisine menu and serve a variety of vegetarian and non vegetarian delicacies. They do not allow any catering vendors from outside for any events in the property. They provide inhouse alcohol and alcohol from outside is not allowed.LocationLocated in Jaipur on the Bhawani Singh Road, Rambagh Palace is a great wedding venue for your special day. The guests can visit Amber Fort, or float blissfully in a hot air balloon or explore local block printing art.It is one of the perfect venues to host all kinds of ceremonies or celebrations. They will ensure to make your celebration, eventful and worth remembering a lifetime. You can check for availability and prices directly from WedMeGood.

name: Shutterdown - Lakshya Chawla
description: Shutterdown  is a wedding photography company established by Lakshya Chawla. Based out of Delhi NCR, his team leaves no stone unturned to cover weddings to the best of their ability. They are a leading choice for destination weddings all over India. Their entire team is great with the camera, capturing candid moments between the bride and groom, as well as their families. Shutterdown - Lakshya Chawla makes sure that they use only the best tools and techniques prevalent in the business. They're also fabulous with various types of videos, be it the wedding film or the teasers, they're sure to keep the entire family enagaged.Shutterdown Photography is considered among the best candid wedding photographers in the country. To add to that, they are also nicknamed as “Destination Wedding Specialist.” They have covered weddings across coveted locations in India such as Udaipur, Goa, and Jodhpur, along with international weddings in Kenya, Tanzania, Hong Kong. They have upcoming projects lined up in East Europe and Southeast Asia. Additionally, Shutterdown - Lakshya Chawla’s cinematography team has one of the best cinematographers of the country having more than 10 years of rich experience in cinematography.From Shutterdown - Lakshya Chawla:“Every Indian Wedding is a blend of multiple emotions." So the team at Shutter Down Photography are a team of highly experienced wedding photographers and cinematographers who aim to create a visual diary of love, laughter and emotions. We love the whole transformation of how two people transcend to become soul mates. We’ve travelled around the globe to capture wonderful weddings and on our way we have unraveled the true essence of a wedding. We aim to build client relationships, as we know that wedding is a very pivotal part of Indian tradition and thereby we ensure that we capture it beautifully and wrap it up with our magical skills of candid photography and cinematography.**Services Offered by Shutterdown - Lakshya Chawla:Shutterdown offers several services related to wedding photography and cinematography:**Still PhotographyCandid Wedding PhotographyTraditional PhotographyWedding FilmsSave the Date VideosTeasers … and a lot more.Working Style of ShutterdownShutter down pride themselves on their quirky style of photography the vivid barrage of colours used in their pictures. They take up only limited weddings every month, thus ensuring that they are able to give complete dedication to every project and please you with the final results. The wonderful reviews by previous clients are testimonial to this claim. Rest assured, you are bound to have a great experience with their team if you plan to book them for your wedding in Delhi NCR or for your destination wedding anywhere across the globe.Latest Pricing and Portfolio of ShutterdownTo know more about their services, contact them directly through the wedmegood portal. RECALL IS A SCAM ARTIST.
Raonak is the greatest scam artist of all time. We had hired him for our engagement in Dec 2022. Everything went smooth and he had asked for his complete payment after the event was done. We asked him to take it once the photos and videos have been sent but he said he cannot do that as full advance is the industry norm.

We trusted him and gave him the payment and after that he just vanished. The photos of the event was luckily given to us by a friend of his who he had hired for the event. The video and other pictures taken by Raonak have not come yet. He has stopped replying to message or calls. 

He is the WORST SCAM ARTIST. We are in the process of lodging an FIR against him as well. Please we warned and DO NOT HIRE HIM
Also his company has shut down and he doesn’t pay GST but takes that money. And he has no employees left as he has not paid them. 

Call me or comment if you want any further proof.
Sheshank Kumar

BE VERY CAREFUL!!!!

Summary: Choose someone else. DO NOT HIRE RECALL IMAGES IF YOU WANT TO RECALL ANYTHING. His company is shut down. 

Details:

We hired Rounak for our engagement ceremony on the Dec 2022. He seemed like a good and friendly person at first. He asked for advance and then the full payment post the event. He told us it was the industry norm so we obliged and handed him the entire amount.

Post this he took weeks to give us the photographs of the event. These came out well but he missed out a lot of people at the event and the number of photographs were a lot less than expected. But the quality was good. What we had realized is that he had gotten his friend along with him and he was the photographer. He was from Rikaar images, and we realized that he was the person responsible for the beautiful images in the first place. The person from Rikaar saved the event with his beautiful pictures. 

We had paid Rounak (Recall Images) the full amount for even a video. He kept delaying for weeks stating one excuse or another. After 2 months he stopped replying all together. No reply to messages or to calls. He just ran away with the money. We even asked Rikaar to help us locate him but he told us Rounak was not picking up even his phone calls.

We then did more research (which we should have done before) and realized that he had done the same with others as well. And his employees were not paid. His IG is not updated and his company is more or less shut down. 

My sincerest request to all of you. DO NOT HIRE RECALL. You can explore Rikaar or any other photographer. But DO NOT take recall if you want to avoid a nightmare.

Message me for proof or any other explanations.
Ria Bajaj

We evaluated Instagram pages, reviews of wedding pages, prices, and other factors and concluded that The Wedding Files, without any doubt, was the best option.

Let me list some things that stood out for us

1. They were punctual with timings; whether it was 5 am in the morning or 2 am at night, they were there.

2. They remained invisible during the functions, we had no idea where they were capturing moments from and the best part they never asked to pose or stand in a certain way for pictures. Whatever they captured was natural to its core.

3. The edited images and movies were stunningly gorgeous and captivating. We were blown away by the shooting angles, background music, and overall storytelling of our marriage.

name: House On The Clouds
description: The wedding day is one of the most precious days in one’s life. To capture all the bittersweet moments, the joys, the sorrows, the anxieties, the fun, and the laughter, it is important to hire a wedding photography and videography team who will do the job well. If you are a soon-to-be-wed couple in Bangalore, then House On The Clouds by Siddharth Sharma is a great option for you.House On The Clouds is a studio based out of Bangalore. This is a team of ace cinematographers and wedding filmmakers with an experience of two years in the industry. In fact, they have also been awarded the ‘Wedding Filmmaker of the Year’ at the Wedding Sutra Awards, 2018. Their venture is one that takes a modern approach to an age old tradition. With a creative perspective and a keen view to capture the best of the best moments, House On The Clouds has a unique outlook, allowing the preservation of your priceless memories and emotions for you to cherish forever.By The Team“We are wanderers, explorers of light, driven by a strong desire to capture fleeting moments onto frames and stitching them together to create a visual symphony which is both organic and timeless. We do not follow trends and have our own unique non-linear approach of presenting stories. Our wedding films are carefully crafted to blend traditional with modern, combining stunning visuals with creative storytelling.”Services Offered by House On The CloudsHouse On The Clouds offers a wide range of services related wedding to cinematography and photography. Some of these include:Save The Date videosWedding FilmsTeaser VideosStill PhotographyWorking StyleHouse On The Clouds has a modern approach to weddings, with the videos centred entirely around content and visuals, rather than trends. A beautifully edited feature film takes about three to four months to be delivered to you, and is generally of 25-30 minutes duration. You will also receive a 5-minute cinematic trailer. Further, the team travels all around the world, so even if your wedding is not in Bangalore, do not worry!If you are pleased by House On The Clouds, then contact them at the earliest for your wedding day! You may browse through the portfolio of the team on the WedMeGood portal for a clearer picture (quite literally!).
